item.name: addslashes()
item.resume: Add a backslash before quotes, double-quotes and backslashes in string variables

item.name: :after
item.resume: Create a pseudo-element whom is the last child of the matched element

item.name: array()
item.resume: Create a new array

item.resume: Computes the difference between arrays

item.resume: Remove the last element of an array

item.resume: Add one or more elements in the end of an array

item.resume: Remove the first element of an array

item.resume: Extract a slice of an array

item.name: array_unshift()
item.resume: Add one or more elements in the beginning of an array

item.resume: Sort an array in reverse order and maintain key association

item.name: asort()
item.resume: Sort an array and maintain key association

item.name: background
item.note: Shortcut for: background-color — background-image — background-position — background-repeat and background-attachment
item.resume: Sets all background properties

item.name: background-attachment
item.resume: Specify if a background-image scrolls this the current element or is fixed within the wiewport

item.resume: Sets the background color of the current element

item.name: background-image
item.resume: Sets the background image of the current element

item.resume: Sets the background position in the current element

item.name: background-repeat
item.resume: Specify if a background-image is repeated and how

item.resume: Decode data encoded with MIME base64

item.resume: Encode data with MIME base64

item.resume: Create a pseudo-element whom is the first child of the matched element

item.resume: Sets the border to each side of the box
